sentences.en: a committee that aims to uphold educational standards
sentences.cn: 旨在保持教育水准的委员会

sentences.en: And do you solemnly sWear to uphold the values of brotherhood?
sentences.cn: 你能敬重兄弟们间之友情的价值?

sentences.en: Eight columns uphold the big dome.
sentences.cn: 八根柱子支撑着这个大圆顶.

sentences.en: Fortunately , you're around to uphold the dignity of the liberal arts. "
sentences.cn: 亏得有你, 撑撑文科的场面. ”

sentences.en: I think marriage is used to uphold patriarchal control.
sentences.cn: 我觉得婚姻是用来维系父权统治的。

sentences.en: I will not imperil my soul. I will uphold the justice of the Church.
sentences.cn: 我不愿使我的灵魂受到玷污, 我要维护教会法律的公正.

sentences.en: Our policy has been to uphold the law.
sentences.cn: 拥护法律是我们一贯的方针。

sentences.en: Policemen and judges uphold the majesty of the law.
sentences.cn: 警察和法官维护法律的权威.

sentences.en: The Supreme Court is expected to uphold the death sentence.
sentences.cn: 预计最高法院将维持死刑的原判.

sentences.en: We have a duty to uphold the law.
sentences.cn: 维护法律是我们的责任。

sentences.en: We uphold the principle of racial equality.
sentences.cn: 我们坚持种族平等的原则.

sentences.en: Why should I fight to uphold the system that cast me out?
sentences.cn: 我要眼看着它被彻底粉碎才高兴 呢 .

sentences.en: You'd use these weapons against men and women who uphold the law?
sentences.cn: 两把好了你用这些武器对付执法人员?

sentences.en: Yuan Shih - Kai once promised to uphold Republican principles.
sentences.cn: 袁世凯曾经信誓旦旦,说要坚持共和原则.

trans.tran_en: to defend or support a law, system, or principle so that it continues to exist
to defend or support a law, system, or principle so that it continues to exist
